title: Is Egan Bernal Back? Colombian TT Title is His First Victory Since Career-Threatening Crash
content:
Egan Bernal claimed an emotional victory in the Colombian national time trial championship, his first win since a near-fatal crash in 2022.

Read the full article at Is Egan Bernal Back? Colombian TT Title is His First Victory Since Career-Threatening Crash on Velo.
author: ahood
